{"id":1713966419,"question_id":345,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1753667230,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1713966419/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"11.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string reverseVowels(string s) {\n        int N = (int)s.size();    \n        \n        set<char> vowels = {'a', 'A', 'e', 'E', 'i', 'I', 'o', 'O', 'u', 'U'};\n        string p = s;\n        vector<char> rev;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            if (vowels.count(p[i])) {\n                rev.push_back(p[i]);\n            }\n        }\n        reverse(rev.begin(), rev.end());\n        int cnt=0;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            if (vowels.count(p[i])) {\n                p[i] = rev[cnt++];\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return p;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1125}
